original_text: But thou shalt in any wise let the dam go, and take the young to thee; that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days.
korean_text: 어미는 반드시 놓아 줄 것이요 새끼는 취하여도 되나니 그리하면 네가 복을 누리고 장수하리라

sentences.original_text: But thou shalt in any wise let the dam go
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 경우에든 암컷은 놓아주어야 하리라

sentences.original_text: and take the young to thee
that it may be well with thee
and that thou mayest prolong thy days
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 날을 길게 누리게 되리라
